logs.title: Automated Daily Maintenance System with Cron
logs.description: Implemented comprehensive daily maintenance automation that runs at 20:00 CET (19:00 UTC) to update logs, backup server, and create snapshots.
details: 🤖 Created daily-maintenance.sh script for automated maintenance tasks
📅 Configured cron job: 0 19 * * * (20:00 CET / 19:00 UTC daily)
📝 Auto-updates Logs page with maintenance entries via Python JSON manipulation
💾 Executes backup.sh for daily backups (30-day retention)
📸 Runs snapshot.sh for system snapshots (12-month retention)
🏥 System health checks: disk space, memory, services status
📊 Comprehensive logging to /home/ubuntu/backups/citricloud/maintenance.log
🔧 Fixed JSON syntax error in logs.json (line 148: missing colon)
✅ Tested successfully - all maintenance tasks execute properly
🔄 Fully automated - no manual intervention required

logs.title: Province-Based City Filtering for 18 Countries
logs.description: Implemented intelligent location hierarchy where cities are dynamically filtered based on selected province/state for countries with provincial systems.
details: 🌍 Added PROVINCE_CITIES mapping for 18 countries: Netherlands, USA, Canada, Germany, Australia, Brazil, Mexico, Spain, Italy, Japan, India, China, UK, South Korea, Indonesia, Philippines, France, Switzerland, Belgium
📍 Total coverage: 950+ cities mapped with province-level filtering across all 18 countries
🔄 Created handleProvinceChange() to filter cities from PROVINCE_CITIES[country][province]
🎯 Updated handleCountryChange() for smart city population: waits for province selection if PROVINCE_CITIES exists, otherwise shows all cities immediately
🔒 City field disabled with 'Select a province/state first' placeholder when country with provinces selected but no province chosen
✅ Province dropdown triggers city filtering on both select and manual input
📦 Profile.tsx: 3,879 lines (185.29 KB, 35.63 KB brotli)
🛡️ Graceful fallback: Countries without PROVINCE_CITIES show all cities from COUNTRY_CITIES immediately
